changelog:
This is the final update, there will be no more updates.
This app is now discontinued.

- Fixed FLAC not downloading for some tracks
- Fixed some tagging issues
- Fixed autologin
- Fixed download for albums/playlist with more than 255 songs
- Fixed cover not downloading
- Fixed XSS "exploit"
- Added new badge in artist tab
- Added preview volume
- Added some new variables to the track and folder names
- Added continuous scrolling
- Added tab selection in artists
- Added table sorting where possible
- Added more multitag separators
